115a6('dul ba): zhus pabatsun pa spyan 'dren pa gang nas mchis kun dga' bo grong khyer sbom lte bu nas so// btsun pagrong khyer sbom lta bur ji srid cig mchis/ kun dga' bo dpag chad brgya lhag
115a7('dul ba): tsam yod kyis song la/ dge slong rnams la khyed cag las gang dang gang sang grong khyer sbom lta bur song nas zan za bar spro bar tshul shing long zhig sgo shig/ btsun pa dka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang
115a8('dul ba): ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la mnyan nas/ tshul shing blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gnas brnyan gnas
115b1('dul ba): brtan rnams kyis tshul shing blangs so// de'i tshe yul chu mag can na gnas pa'i gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa gang po shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'gu par gyur pa des kyang tshul
115b2('dul ba): shing drang bar brtsams pa dang / de la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos slar tshigs su bcad de smras pa tshe dang ldan pa zan 'don// ko stsal bdag po'i pho brang ngam// rab sbyin khyim dang ri dgas
115b3('dul ba): kyi khyim gyi zas yang ma lags so// grong khyer sgom zhes bya ba// dpag tshad brgya lhag mchis pa der// rdzu 'phrul gyis ni bzhud 'tshal ngas// gang po khyod ni ma gsungs
115b4('dul ba): bzhugs de shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba yin/ des rdzu 'phrul ma skyes pas de 'di snyam du sems te/ gi phyir bdag gi nyon mongs pa'i tshogs mtha' dag rtsal cing
115b5('dul ba): bor la spangs shing so sor spangs na/ bdag mu sregasacan dang thun mong pa'i rdzu 'phrul la spyod lug gam snyam nas/ des brtson 'grus la gnas te/ rdzu 'phrul bskyed pas dzAH
115b6('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gnas brtan gsum pa la tshul shing ma byon pa de'i bar de lag pa glang po che'i sna lta bu brkyang nas tshul shing blangs te/ de nas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ go'u tam 'dzin
115b7('dul ba): mngon shes drug po nyid// grags pa dang ni thos pas 'thob min la// tshan gyi yon tan rnams dang ngag dang ni// yid smon chen pos kyang ni ma yin gyi// bdag 'dra yongs su
115b8('dul ba): rtogs par byed pa rnams// rgabs dar yal gyur kyang zhi ba dang // tshul khrims lhag mthong stobs dang bsam gtan stobs// rnam par du mas mngon shes drug ldan 'gyur// de nas ba
116a1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong 'din pa'i dge slong rnams kyi mchog yin te/ nga'i nyan thos mchod pa'i rdul shing brang ba/ 
116a2('dul ba): la dang po'o// tshul shing len pa rnams kyi nang na 'di lta ste/ yul chu mag can na gnas pa'i gnas brtan gang po mchog yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
116a3('dul ba): bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la/ ngas dge slong dag khyed kyis dge ba mi spyom pa dang / sdig pa mi bcab par gnas par bya'o zhes bshad mod kyi 'on kyang grong khyer de na mu
116a4('dul ba): stegs pa rnams gnas pas khyed las gang gis rdzu 'phrul dgang thob pa de des grong khyer sbom lta bur sau/ dang la zan bza' bar bya'o zhes bsgo shig/ btsun pa bka
116a5('dul ba): bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas dge slong na mas la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di
116a6('dul ba): skad ces ngas dge slong rnams kyis dge ba mi sbom pa dang / sdig pa mi bcab par gnas par bya'o zhes bshad mod kyis zhes bya ba nas song la zan bza' bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// rgyal
116a7('dul ba): pos grong khyer slom lta bu rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo rnams sel du bcug ste/ tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ dri zhim po'i pog por sna tshogs bshams/ dar gyi
116a8('dul ba): rgutshun 'phyang mang po dbyangs me tog sna tshogs chal bar bkram ste/ dga' ltar byas so// grong khyer sgom lta bu la sgo bco brgyad yod la rgyal po de la yang bu bcu bdun yod de/ grong khyer/ 
116b1('dul ba): gyi sgo re res song rgyal po'i bu rnams 'byor ba mchog dang bkod/ sgo chen por na sbom lta bu'i bdag po'i rgyal po/ rgyal po'i 'byor bachen po dang / tshe dang ldan pagang po dang / shing gan pan/ 
116b2('dul ba): dang rgya skegs kyi rnacha can dang / zha nye'i rna cha can 'dug go// ji tsam na lo ma 'dri ma dang / shang tshe 'drim pa dang / snod spyad 'drim bdag rdzu 'phrul gyis lhags pa rgyal pos mdzod/ 
116b3('dul ba): nas smras bci btsun pa gang po bcom ldan 'das gshegs sam/ des smras pa/ 'di dag ni lo ma 'dri ma dang / shing tshe 'drim pa dang / snod spyad pa 'dri ma lags te/ bcom ldan
116b4('dul ba): 'das ma lags so// ci tsam na dge slong gnas pa rtan gnas brtan rnams bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa rnam pa du mas lpags pa dang / rgyal pos yang dris pa
116b5('dul ba): ci btsun pa gang po bcom ldan 'das gshegs sam/ des smras pa ma lags te/ 'di dag ni dge/ slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs
116b6('dul ba): pa rnam pa du mas lpags pa lags so// de nas dge bsnyen zhig gis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ kha cig seng ge stags dang glang po che na krung dang khyu mchog bzang po bcibs/ kha cig
116b7('dul ba): rin chen gzhal med khang dang ri dang shing mdzes shing rta 'bar la brten// zhan dag na mkha'i ngos las chu 'dzin glog gi phreng bas rgyan pa lta bur ni// rab tu dgyes bzhin lha
116b8('dul ba): ya pho brang lta bur rdzu 'phrul dag gos gshegs par brtson// kha tsigs brtol gyen du 'byung // kha cig namakha'i dkyil nas 'bab// kha cig stan las sprul par byed// rdzu 'phrul/ 
117a1('dul ba): ldan pa'i mthul ltos// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu zhabs gnyis krus te/ gtsug lag khang du zhugs nas gdan banas/ 
117a2('dul ba): pa nyid la bzhugs te/ sku drang por bsrang nas dgongs pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag go// dzaM tsam na bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon par 'du byed pa dang / bcas pa'i zhabs kyis dri gtsang khang du bdag
117a3('dul ba): ban sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ sa chen po 'di g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so// che mchem rab tu che mchem/ ku
117a4('dul ba): tu rab tu chem chem te/ shar phyogs mthon ni nub bya dgas dma' nub phyogs mthon shar phyogs dam dang/ lho phyogs mthon byang phyogs dpa'/ byang phyogs mthon
117a5('dul ba): phyogs dma'/ mtha' mtho na dbus dma'/ dbus mthonamatha' dma'o// rgyal pos tshe dang ldan pa gang po la dris pa/ 'phags pa gang po 'di zhig lags/ des smras pa/ bcom
117a6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pa'i zhabs kyis dri gtsang khang du bzhag pa des ni sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur pa lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gser gyi
117a7('dul ba): 'od zer gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od bkye ste/ nges 'dzam bu'i gling gser zhun ma lta bur snang bar gyur to// yang rgyal po ngo mtshar du gyur pas mig phye nas dris pa 'phags pa gang po 'di ci lpags
117a8('dul ba): des smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od zer kye ba lags so// / 'dul ba bzhi// bam po ni bu lnga pa/ 
117b1('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das dul bzhi pa 'khor zhi ba 'khor zhib/ dgra bcom pa lnga brgya dang thabs gcig tu sbom lta bur gshegs so// de nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na gnas pa'i lha des bkulaH
117b2('dul ba): yal gzhig blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la grib ma byed cing rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du song ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bgal nyal ba dang / khams
117b3('dul ba): dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang 'thun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ thos nas lha de 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi gu mtho ba ye
117b4('dul ba): shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs para'abras bu mngon sum du byas par gyur te/  dan phyogs gzhan zhig na yugs sa mo lnga brgya
117b5('dul ba): tsam gnas pa de dag gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus
117b6('dul ba): mdzes par byas pa 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba rin po che'i rabo 'gro ba lta bur kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong ma thag tu yang de rnams bcom ldan
117b7('dul ba): 'das la sems dang pa chen po skyes so// 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i rgyu can gyis sems can gyis dang por sangs rgyas mthong ltar lo bcu
117b8('dul ba): gnyis su mi gnas kyi sems goms par byas pa dang / bu med pas bu rnyed pa dang / dngul pos gter mthong ba dang / rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug
118a1('dul ba): thob pa na de ltar nyams dga' ba skyed pa ma yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de rnams kyi gdul ba'i dus la gzigs nas/ dge slong na/ 
118a2('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo ngos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas bcom
118a3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang / ngag la nyal dang / khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas zhes bya ba nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bso zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin
118a4('dul ba): du'o// de rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa btsun pa pa dag cag la 'di lta bu ni mas ma bgyis/ pas ma lags// 
118a5('dul ba): rgyal pos ma lags lhas ma lags/ sdug pa sa ma lags/ rang gi skye bo dang / gnyer gyi tshe gas kyis ma lags/ sngon gyi 'das pas ma lags/ 
118a6('dul ba): dge sbyong dang bram zes ma lags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la mdzad de/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni skams/ rus pa'i ri bo las ni bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo na bkum
118a7('dul ba): thar pa dang / mtho ris kyi sgo na phye nas bdag cag lnga dang mi rnamasu ni bkod de/ btsun pa bdag cag 'phags so// mngon par 'phags so// bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang / 
118a8('dul ba): chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis bdag cag dge bsnyen du bzung du gsal/ de dag stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gangan ba de logs su thal mo sbyar
118b1('dul ba): ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan 'das bdag cag cung zad cig stsol cig dang / de la bdag cag bgyi ba dag bgyi'o// de nas bcom
118b2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis dbu skra dang / sen mo bregs te byin no// de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten zhig brtsigs so// de nas rgyal bu rgyal
118b3('dul ba): byed kyi tshal na gnas pa'i lha gang yin pa des mchod rten de'i 'khor sar bku la'i yal ga de bskyed de/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni mchod rten 'di
118b4('dul ba): la bgyi ba bgyid cing mchis so zhes de de nyid na gnas so// de la kha cig gis ni yugs sa ma'i mchod rten no zhes bya bar shes so// kha cig gis ni bku
118b5('dul ba): la'i 'khor sa zhes bya bar shes te/ mchod rten la phyag byed pa'i dge slong dag da dung yang phyag byed do// ba ma ldan 'das gshegs pa dang / ji tsam na bsti gnas gzhan
118b6('dul ba): na drang srong lnga brgya gnas te/ de dag gis ni bsti gnas de me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / chu phun sum tshogs pas/ de dag des rgyags nas ci yang mi sems so// de nas bcom ldan
118b7('dul ba): 'das kyis de rnams kyis gdul ba'i dus la gzigs nas/ bsti gnas der gshegs te byin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis bsti gnas de'i me tog dang 'bras bu ni blags chu ni skams/ ne'u
118b8('dul ba): bsing rnams ni glogs/ 'dug nas dag ni brtib bo// de nas drang srong de dag lag pa 'gram par gtad nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
119a1('dul ba): par ci'i phyir sems khongs su chud cing 'dug/ de rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi zhing rkang gnyis khyod 'dir gshegs na/ bdag
119a2('dul ba): cag ni gnas skabs 'di 'dra bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong dag bsti gnas me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / chu phun sum tshogs pa ci ste ma rung / 
119a3('dul ba): ji sngon gyi ji lta/ bde bzhin du bya 'am/ bcom ldan 'das mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul brtul ba dang / sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to// de nas de dag
119a4('dul ba): mchog tu yang mtshan du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad pa skyes so// de nas bcom lnga na 'das kyis drang srong lnga brgya po de dag gis bsams pa dang / 
119a5('dul ba): bag la nyal dang / khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang 'thun pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos na/ sa de dag gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ 
119a6('dul ba): rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrubs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag cag legs
119a7('dul ba): par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag cag tshangs par spyod pa sprad
119a8('dul ba): par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la dge slong tshur shog tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i mod la skra dang kha spu byi ba dang // 
119b1('dul ba): snam sbyar gyon par gyur te/ lag na lhung bzed dang byam bum thogs pa dang / skra dang kha spu zhag bdun skyes pa tsam dang / dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta
119b2('dul ba): bur gnas par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas// skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing // mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te// sangs rgyas dgongs
119b3('dul ba): pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur// de dag gis 'bad pa dang / brtsal bar brtson 'grus brtsams pas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang / mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste
119b4('dul ba): 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad ces bya ba nas mngon du smra bar bya/ bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de dag la 'doms par byed pa'i drang srong gang yin pa des gsol
119b5('dul ba): pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi cha byad 'dis kyi bro'o/ tshigs chen po bsdus pa de dag je dad pa skyes par bgyis la slad kyis rab tu dbyung bar bgyi'o// de nas
119b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das drang srong lnga brgya dang sngon gyi dge slong rnams kyis zla ba khams blta bur bskor nas de nyid rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi nam mkha' las gshegs te/ rim gyis bdun
119b7('dul ba): drang srong shing gos can zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ drang srong des bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba nas/ kun nas mdzes pa
119b8('dul ba): rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ngo // zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// mthong ma thag tu de bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad par gyur te/ de dang pa bskyes nas bsams
120a1('dul ba): pa mal bdag ri las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das blta zhing 'gror ni bcom ldan 'das gdul ba la gzigs pas 'das par 'gyur gyis mal bdag nyid
120a2('dul ba): mchong bar bya'o snyam nas/ de ri las bdag nyid mchongs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsnyel ba mo mnga' ba'i chos can yin pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis/ 
120a3('dul ba): blangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos nas zhing
120a4('dul ba): gos can gyis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrubs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'a ngas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag legs par
120a5('dul ba): gsung ba'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen pa/ ra rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces
120a6('dul ba): bya bas rab tu byung ngo // zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal
120a7('dul ba): ba dge slong dag pa'i dge slong dad pas rnam par grol ba rnams kyi mchog ni 'di yin te/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong shing gis can no// de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong stong gis
120a8('dul ba): yongs su bskor te/ cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad cing grong khyer sbom lta bur gshegs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ gal te sgo cag nas zhugs nas/ gzhan / 
120b1('dul ba): gzhan du sems par 'gyur bas/ ma lang rdzu 'phrul kho nas 'jug par bya'o snyam nas/ de nas rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi na mkha' las grong khyer sdom lta bu'i dbus su gshegs so// de nas sbom sa bu
120b2('dul ba): bdag po'i rgyal po dang / tshe dang ldan pa gang po dang shing gi rnam can dang / rgya sngags kyi rnam can dang / zha nye'i rnam can dang / rgyal ba'i sras bcu bdun pa de dag kyang ra / 
120b3('dul ba): gi 'khor dang srog chags brgya stong phrag dum bcom ldan 'das gang na 'dir song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das srag chags stong drag du mas nam ma byas shing can dan gyi phreng ba'i khang bdangs gang nas
120b4('dul ba): der gshegs te/ byin nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi dgung la gdan nyams pa nyid la bzhugs te/ dpo'i tshigs chen po des bcom ldan 'das ma mthong ngo // tsan
120b5('dul ba): dan gyi phreng ba'i khang bzangs zhig la thug pa dang / btsun/ ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa gal te tsan dan rgyo th+liM/ nga ba'i khang bzangs zhig par gyur na/ sbyin bdag rnams kyi
120b6('dul ba): bsod nams kyi bar chad du 'gyur gyis ma la ngas 'di shel gyi rang bzhin du sprul par bya'o snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de ji ltar skye bo'i tshogs des sangs rgyas kyi sku sgrib pa med par mtho/ 
120b7('dul ba): bar 'gyur bar shel gyi rang bzhin du sprul to// de nas 'khor de dag gi bsam pa dang 'gal nyal ba dang / khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang 'dra ba'i chos bshang pa mdzad de// 
120b8('dul ba): de nas thos nas srog chags brgya stong phrig dums khyad par chen po dag rtogs te/ kha cig gis ni thar pa'i cha dang 'thun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed/ kha cig gis ni nges par 'byed pa'i mdang thu gyi
121a1('dul ba): kha cig gis ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
121a2('dul ba): pu kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed/ kha cig gis ni rang sangs
121a3('dul ba): rgyas kyi byang chub tu'o// kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'o// 'khor de la phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang / chos la 'bab pa dang / dge 'dun
121a4('dul ba): la bab par bkod do// de nas shing gi rna cha can dang / rgya ste gas kyi rna cha can dang / zha nye'i rna cha can gyis/ gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas gdan
121a5('dul ba): bshams te/ nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol ba/ btsun pa gdugs tshod lags shing mchis nas/ bcom ldan 'das
121a6('dul ba): de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po nag po dang / go'u ta ma zhes bya ba rgya mtsho chen po na gnas pa gnyis kyis bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer sbom lta bu
121a7('dul ba): na chos 'chad kyis dong nas mnyan par bya'o snyam mo// de nas de gnyis klu lnga brgya'i 'khor dang grong khyer sbom lta bur chu bo lnga brgya pab nas chas so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsrel ba
121a8('dul ba): ma mnga' ba'i chos can yin pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ klu'i rgyal po nag po dang go'u tam 'di gnyis gal te grong khyer sbom lta bur 'ongs par gyur na/ yul phung bar
121b1('dul ba): byed par 'gyur ro snyam nasabacom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rings pa'i bsod snyoms longs shig/ 
121b2('dul ba): mo'u dgal gyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rings pa'i bsod snyoms ni lnga ste gang zhe na/ glo bur ba dang / 'gro bar chas pa dang / nad pa dang / nad g.yog dang / dge skos so// skabs
121b3('dul ba): 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das dge bskos su dgongs te/ bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyis de nyid nas steng gi nam mkha' las gshegs so// bcom ldan 'das dang mo'u dgal rgya
121b4('dul ba): bu gnyis klu'i rgyal po nag po dang / go'u tam gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas bka' stsal pa/ klu'i dbang po grong khyer sbom lta bu la soms la/ yul phung
121b5('dul ba): bar ma bya shig/ de gnyis kyis gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag cag gang srog chags grog sbur la yang rgan/ da pa mi bgyid pa de lta bu'i dad pas mchis na sbom lta bu na gnas
121b6('dul ba): pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po nag po dang / go'u tam la de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos nas sangs rgyas dang / 
121b7('dul ba): chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song zhing bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bzung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas gsol ba'i mdzad par rtsams pa dang / klu re re nas bsams pa kye ma'o// 
121b8('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la bdag gi chu'i btung ba gsol lo snyam mo// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa gal te/ gcig gi chu gsol na ni/ des na gzhan dang gzhan du sems par 'gyur bas
122a1('dul ba): thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam du dgongs nas de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal rgya
122a2('dul ba): bu song la gang na chu bo lnga brgya 'dres pa de las chus lhung bzed khong la khyer te shog shig/ btsun pa ka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan/ 
122a3('dul ba): nas gang du chu bo lnga brgya 'dres pa de nas chus lhung bzed bkang nas khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lhung bzed bkang ba'i chu phul ba dang
122a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes te gsol lo/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos bsams pa/ bcom nga ldan 'das sngon bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag
122a5('dul ba): pha dang mas ni bu gsos/ bsrings bskyed/ de nu mas bsnun/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sna tshog/ sa ston par byed pa yin pas shin tu dga' ba byed pa ste/ pus
122a6('dul ba): phrag pa gcig la ni ma bzhag/ cig shos la ni pha bzhag nas la brgya tshang bar khur du thogs sam/ sa chen po 'di'i nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / 
122a7('dul ba): dngul dang / gser dang / rdo'i snying po dang / sdug dang / pad+ma rA ga dang / dung g.yas su 'khyil ba ste/ de lta bu'o dbang phyug la bdag por bcug kyang bus pa ma la de tsam
122a8('dul ba): gyis phan thogs pa'am/ lan lon par mi 'gyur gyi gang gis pha ma dad pa med pa dang pa phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug la 'dul zhing 'dzud de/ so sor 'gad
122b1('dul ba): par byed pa dang tshul khrims 'chal ba tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa dang / ser sna can gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / shes rab 'chal ba shes rab phun sum tshogs pa/ 
122b2('dul ba): yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug la/ 'dul zhing 'dzud de/ so sor 'god par byed na de tsam gyis bus pa dang ma la phan 'dogs pa dang lan lon pa yin no zhes gsungs na/ 
122b3('dul ba): bdag gi ni ma la lan ci yang ma lon gyis/ ma la bdag gis bdag gi ma gang du skyes pa bsam mo snyam nas/ bsam pa la zhugs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du skyes/ 
122b4('dul ba): par mthong ngo de na de su'i gdul ba yin par brtag sa nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yin par ma thong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag lam ring
122b5('dul ba): po nas 'dir 'ongs pas/ ci nas kyang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la don 'di gsol lo snyam na sa bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
122b6('dul ba): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon dge slong dag pa dang ma ni bu la shin tu dga' ba byed pa yin no zhes gsungs na/ bdag gi ma 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du skyes te/ de yang
122b7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis 'dul bar 'gyur ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste 'dul bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ moru
122b8('dul ba): dgel gyi bu su rdzu 'phrul gyis dong / bcom ldan 'das bdag gi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po rab kyi rtse mo la gos pa bar/ 
123a1('dul ba): zhing gshegs pa dang / zhag bdun gyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du byon to// bu mo bzang mo des tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu rgyang ring po kho na nas
123a2('dul ba): mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang bcas pas de'i drung du song ste smras pa/ kye ma'o yun ring po zhig lon nas bu mthong ngo // kye ma'o yun ring mo ring mo zhig lon nas bu mthong ngo // 
123a3('dul ba): de nas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag rab tu byung ba 'di ni rgan na/ ji lta bu mo 'di de'i ma yin/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ shes
123a4('dul ba): ldan dag kho bo'i lus 'di 'dis bskyed de/ des na kho bo'i me yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo bza dang mo de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams
123a5('dul ba): dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang 'thun pa'i 'pha/ gas pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos nas bu mo bzang mo nges 'jig
123a6('dul ba): tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas lan gsum gyis ched du brjod pa ched du
123a7('dul ba): brjod do zhes bya ba nas/ lha dang mi rnams su rab tu bzhag ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no// yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pas mi bzad pa'i ngan song lam ni
123a8('dul ba): khyod kyi mthus bcad do// mtho ris 'gro ba bsod nams bzang ldan phye/ mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ khyod la brten nas shin tu rnam dag mig/ nyes dang bral
123b1('dul ba): bas dag pa deng 'dir thob// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i go 'phang ni thob nas// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol bdag gis rgal// 'gro bar lha min lha dang mis mchod pa// skyen
123b2('dul ba): 'chi dang na dang rnam bral ba// srid pa stong du rnyed par rab dka' ba// thub pa khyod mthong der 'dir 'bras bur bcas// btsun pa bdag ni 'phags shing mngon par 'phags te/ bdag
123b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang dge 'dun la skyabasu mchi lags kyis dge bsnyen du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsam pa thag pas skyab su mchi bar mngon par spro lags
123b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang thabs gcig tu der bsod snyoms sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdza dang du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo bzang mo de la
123b5('dul ba): cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas bu mo bzang mos bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar rig ste/ btsa ma ldan 'das dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po
123b6('dul ba): gdan la bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ gtsang zhing bzod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/ rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod
123b7('dul ba): pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bslabs shing tshim par byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas/ phyag gnyis bcabs te/ lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas
123b8('dul ba): stan dma' ba zhig blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bting nas/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug pa dang / de la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bshad do// bcom ldan
124a1('dul ba): 'das kyi lhung bzed tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos blangs te lhung bzed 'khru bar byed pa na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u
124a2('dul ba): dgal gyis bu 'dong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs so// su'i rdzu 'phrul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi'o// gal te de lta na rgyal byed kyi tshal soms shig/ bcom ldan 'das la
124a3('dul ba): skol byon lags sam/ mo'u dgal gyi bu yu'u byin zin to// de nas ngo mtshar du dad pa'i yid kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul 'di'i ming ci lags/ mo'u dgal gyi bu yid mgyogs
124a4('dul ba): yin no// btsun pa sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo de lta bu ni dang ngag gi glo bar ma chud do// gal te bdag gi glo bar chu dad par gyur na/ bdag gi lus til gyi phye ma ltar bgyis
124a5('dul ba): kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba zhig na/ da ni shing ga pa bzhin cir bgyir yang ma mchis so// dge slong rnams
124a6('dul ba): the tsom skyes te/ the tshom thad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa gang pos las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug pa nor mang ba longs
124a7('dul ba): spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes lags/ las ci zhig bgyis na des bran mo'i mngal du skyes shing rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bgyis
124a8('dul ba): legs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gang po nyid las tshogs rnyed pa rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ gdon ma za bar 'byung bar
124b1('dul ba): 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas/ gang pos las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams
124b2('dul ba): la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa
124b3('dul ba): ngag ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/ chung mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus// rnyed nas lus can rnams la ni// 'bras
124b4('dul ba): bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid// dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa ba dbang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ sto/ pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
124b5('dul ba): sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'dzi garten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med balha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'ong / 
124b6('dul ba): srung shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer ba ra na ser nye bar brten cing bzhugs so// de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung nas sde snod gsum par gyur te/ chos bzhin
124b7('dul ba): gyi dge 'dun gyi zhal tab byed do// re shig cig na dgra bcom pa zhig la dge bskos bab ste/ des gtsug lag khang phyag dar bya bar brtsams pa dang / rlung langs pas phyag dar phan tshun du khyer bar
124b8('dul ba): gyur to// 'das bsams pa re shig rlung zhi bar gyur gyi bar du bzhag go snyam pa las/ ji tsam na gtsug lag khang de ma byas pa zhal ta ba des mthong nas/ de kun nas dkris pa drag pos ngagatsug
125a1('dul ba): po'i las byung ba/ bran mo'i bu zhig dge bskos byed/ dgra bcom pa des mthong nas/ des bsam pa 'di kun nas dkris pa yin pas re shig bzhag la phyis ga par
125a2('dul ba): bya'o// skum nas gang gi me kun nas dkris pa dang bral ba de che de'i drung du song ste smras pa/ khyod kyis khob su yon shes sam/ des smras pa/ shes te khyod dang kho ba yang dag par rdzogs pa
125a3('dul ba): sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rag tu byung ba yin no// des smras pa/ gal te de lta yin mod kyi kho bas na rab tu byung ba'i bya ba byas so// kho bo na ching ba mtha' dag las grol ba yin la/ khyod
125a4('dul ba): ni 'ching ba mtha' dag gis bcing ba yin pas/ khyod kyis ngag rtsub po'o las phyung gis nyes pa las nyes pashegs shig dang / nges na las de srabs pa dang / yongs su zad pa
125a5('dul ba): dang gtugs par 'gyur ro// des nyes pa la/ sa nyes par bshags pa sems can dmyal bar skye zhing bran mo'i bur 'gyur ba las de sems can dmyal bar ma
125a6('dul ba): skyes par/ tshe rabs lnga brgyar bran mo'i mngal du skyes te/ da ltar gyi bar du srid pa tha ma la yang bran mo'i mngal du skyes par gyur to// gang yang dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byas pa des na/ phyug pa dang / 
125a7('dul ba): nor mang ba dang longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes so// gang yang den blags shing bton pas phung po la mkhas pa dang khams la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa dang / 
125a8('dul ba): rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas par byas pa des na/ nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de
125b1('dul ba): bsan las cig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa cig tu gnag pa yin/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par sman pa ni gcig tu / ra ba yin/ 'dren ma rnams kyin 'dren pa yin no// dge slong / 
125b2('dul ba): de lta bas na las cig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams ni spangs la/ las gcig tu dkar ba la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das/ 
125b3('dul ba): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// gleng bzhi ni rgyal po'i khab na'o// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab
125b4('dul ba): na klu'i rgyal po grag mkhar dang / ri bo gnas so/ de nyid kyi mthus dka' thub kyi chu lnga brgya yang rtag tu 'bab la chu mig dang / mtsho dang mche'u rnams kyang skam par mi 'gyur/ 
125b5('dul ba): lhas dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab pas/  ga rnams kyang lhag par legs par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo dang / 
125b6('dul ba): gnyis brtul ba na de gnyis ri rab kyi bang rim nas/ nyi ma re re zhing bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed de'ong ngo // de nas klu'i rgyal po grog mkhar dang ri bo 'di snyam du sems te
125b7('dul ba): klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo 'di gnyis ri rab kyi bang rim nas nyi ma re re zhing bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed cing 'ong na/ bdag cag 'di nyid na gnas bzhin du
125b8('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur ma byed pa ni bzang po ma yin gyis/ ma la bdag cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam nas/ de gnyis bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der
126a1('dul ba): dod ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom
126a2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis de gnyis la de 'dra ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos nas de gnyis sangs rgyas la skyabs su dong zhing chos dang dge 'dun la skyabasu dong nas/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so// 
126a3('dul ba): gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das las skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams drangs pa de'i tshe lus dang longs spyod lhag par 'phel bar gyur to// de gnyis bcom ldan 'das gang na bder dang
126a4('dul ba): ste phyin nasabacom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la/ dmago bos phyag byas nas gsol ba bcom lda ngan 'das gang gi tshe bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das la stsapra/ 
126a5('dul ba): su mchis shing / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams mnos pa de'i tshe/ lus dang langs spyod lhag par 'phel bar gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das gal te bcom ldan 'das
126a6('dul ba): kyis rjes su gnang na bdag rgyam mchen por 'jug lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa klu'i dbang po dag khyed rgyal ba'i yul na gnas pa yin gyis rgyal po la rtogs shig/ 
126a7('dul ba): de gnyis kyis bsams pa dang dan kyis na bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes sum gnang ngo zhes smras nas/ de nyid na gnas so// klur rgyal po phrog sa
126a8('dul ba): dang ri bo'i kun tu spyod pa ni/ gal te nub ma bcom ldan 'das bltar 'gron na/ lha'i bu'i cha byad kyis so// 'on te nyan par nani khyim bdag gi ma byang kyis so// de gnyis
126b1('dul ba): khyim bdag gi ma byang du byas shang zhin me nang bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bcu byed // rgyal po gdugs can snang ba rgyal rigs kyi mngon par rgyal can gyi kun du spyad pan/ dgang gaH/ 
126b2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das blta bar 'gro ba de'i tshe 'ga' zhig mthong na/ ldang bar mi byed pa med grang zhes mi gnang chen gtong bar byed de ngas mi gnang chen zhig ma hA/ 
126b3('dul ba): kye nang rje song la bcom ldan 'das la su dag bsnyen bkur byed ltos shig/ de song ba las ji tsam na/ khyim bdag gnyis shig mthong nas des bsams pa/ 'di gnyis
126b4('dul ba): ni lba'i yul na gnas pas ci'i byor ldang bar ma byed snyam nas/ ngas rgyal po la smras pa lha khyim bdag gnyisashig mchis pa ni lha'i yul nyid na gnas pa lagaso// 
126b5('dul ba): rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bsams pa/ de gnyis kyis bdag mthing na ci'i phyir ldang bar mi byed kyis 'gro 'o snyam nas de nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ba
126b6('dul ba): dang klu'i rgyal po grog mkhar dang / ri 'os rgyal po gzugs can snying po mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal
126b7('dul ba): po gzugs can stong po mchis na/ tsir shig rgyal po la sti snang bgyi'am/ 'on te chos la bgyi bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ klu'i dbang po dag ches la su sna
126b8('dul ba): byas shig/ dam pa'i chas la ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang bla mar byed la/ chos la ni dgra bcom pa rnams kyang bla mar byed do// tshagasu yang da dka' dum
127a1('dul ba): ba 'das pa'i sangs rgyas gang yon dang // ma byon sangs rgyas gang yin dang // da ltar sangs rgyas yin pa/ mang po'i mya ngan 'joms mdzad pa// gtsu
127a2('dul ba): dang bzhugs dang byon 'gyur ba// thams cad dam chos bla mar byed// 'di ni sangs rgyas chos nyid yin// de bas 'dir bdag pa na 'dod pa// bdag nyid chen por 'dod pa yis// sangs rgyas
127a3('dul ba): bstan pa dran byas te// dam pa'i chos la bkur sti bya// de gnyis kyis ldang ba ma byas so// de nas rgyal po mi bzod pa skyes te// des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bshad du
127a4('dul ba): gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' sa ral pa/ zhe sdang dang ni 'khrug pa dang // ma dad pa mo/ sems kyis ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa'i// 
127a5('dul ba): dam chos shes par mi nus so// gang gis khros dang bag med pa'i// sems ni dul bar byas pa dang // 'dra la mnar sems spangs pa des// legs par gsungs pa
127a6('dul ba): shes par 'gyur// rgyal pos bsams pa/ khyim bdag 'di gnyis 'ongs pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi chos nyan pa'i bar yang chad par gyur to snyam nas/ de stan lnga/ 
127a7('dul ba): langs te bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te song ngo // de song nas blon po rnams la bsgo ba khyim bdag 'di gnyis gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
127a8('dul ba): snga nas dong ba de'i tshe khyed gnyis nga'i yul na ma 'dug shig ces bsgo shig/ de gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bas phyag 'tshal nas song ba dang / blon pa bdag gis so/ 
127b1('dul ba): ba/ lha'i zhal nas khyed cag gnyis nga'i yul na ma 'dug shig ces gsung ngo // de gnyis kyis smras pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal mchi'o// bsams pa bdag cag gnyis kyis/ yun ring
127b2('dul ba): zhig nas bsams pa gang yin pa de ni tshegs chung ngus grub bo snyam mo// de nas 'od pa'i chu chen po phyung nas grog mo chung ngu'i nang zhug so// grog mo chung ngu nas grog mo chen por ro// grog mo chen
127b3('dul ba): bo nas chu bran du'o// chu bran nas chu chen por ro// chu chen po nas rgya mtsho chen por te/ gang gi tshe rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa de'i tshe/ de gnyis phyir zhing lus dang longs spyod shin tu 'phe
127b4('dul ba): bar gyur to// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po'i khab kyi dka' thub kyi chu lnga brgya dang / chu mig dang mtsho dang / mtshe'u rnams kyang chung ba dang yongs su zad pa dang / gtug
127b5('dul ba): par gyur la thug/ lhas kyang dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par ma phab pas lo nyes par gyur te/ mu ga nyam ngab dgon pa slongs mo pas zas rnyed par dka' ba byung bar
127b6('dul ba): gyur to// rgyal pos bsams pa rgyal po'i khab 'di na klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang / grog mkhar gnas te/ de gnyis kyi mthus dka' thub kyi chu lnga brgya yang 'bab/ 
127b7('dul ba): chu mig dang mtsho dang mtshe'u rnams kyang chu che/ lhas kyang dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab pa nyid kyis lo tog legs par rgyas par gyur na/ da ni dka' thub kyi chu lnga brgya dang / chu
127b8('dul ba): mig dang mtsho dang / 'tshe'u rnams kyang chung ba dang / yongs su zad pa dang / gtugs par gyur la jug/ lhas kyang dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par ma pa
128a1('dul ba): bas lo nyes par gyur te/ mu ge nyam ngab dgon pa slongs mo bas zas rnyed par dka 'byung bar gyur na/ klu'i rgyal po ra bo dang / grog mkhar shi'am/ 
128a2('dul ba): bya rgyal po na mkha' lding gis khyer ba 'am/ sprul khas sdigs kyis bzung ba 'am/ des 'jigs nas bres par ma gyur grang / de lta mod kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni
128a3('dul ba): thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs pa yin gyis/ mal bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o snyam du bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom
128a4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug gi/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/  rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das la don
128a5('dul ba): de rgyas par gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po de nyid na shi ba yang mas na/ bya'i rgyal po namakha' lding gis kyang mkhyer/ sprul
128a6('dul ba): rdzogs kyis kyang ma bzung nges 'jigs pas kyang mthos mang kyi rgyal po khyed nyid kyis yul nas bskrad // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de gnyis mthong bar ma dradan/ de gnyis
128a7('dul ba): yul nas bskrad pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ rgyal po chen po ngas khyod dran par bya'o// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis khyim bdag gnyis shig yul nas bskrad pa dran nam/ bcom ldan
128a8('dul ba): 'das dran lagasas// de gnyis ni klu rgyal po'i rib dang srog mo khar yin no// btsun pa de gnyis gang du mchis/ rgyam chechen par dang // bdag gi yul lus kyu
128b1('dul ba): so// rgyal po chen po de gnyis la bzod byin cig dang ma rung bar mi 'gyur ro// de gnyis rgya mtsho chen po na mchis na ji ltar bzod pa stsal/ de gnyis chos brgyad dang / bcu bzhi la khyim bdag
128b2('dul ba): gi cha byad du byas nas/ nga'i zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal du 'ongs dang / ngas rtags brtan gyis khyod kyis bzod pa byin cig/ bcom ldan 'das ci bdag gis rkang pa gnyis la btug par
128b3('dul ba): bgyi 'am rkang pa gnyis la btugs par mi bya ste/ 'on kyang lag brkyong la klu'i dbang po bzod par gsol lo zhes smos shig dang bzod par 'gyur ro// rgyal pos de gnyis 'ong ba la
128b4('dul ba): 'bad de snod cing 'dug pa dang ji tsam na/ de gnyis khyim pa dag gi cha byad du byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi daspyan sngar 'ongs pa dang / de ma thag tu rgyal po yang 'ongs nas
128b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis rtags brtan pa dang / rgyal pos lag pa mngon du brkyang nas smras pa/ klu'i dbang po gnyis pa zad par gsol lo// rgyal po chen po bzod par bgyi'o// 
128b6('dul ba): gal te bzod par gyur na 'dir sbron cig/ rgyal po chen po gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das las bdag cag gis skyabasu 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs pas de nyid kyi tshe bdag cag gi lus
128b7('dul ba): dang longs spyod skyes te/ gal te da che bzhin du 'dir 'ongs na yul ma ga d+har yang mi shong bar 'gyur ro// 'o na yul ma ga d+ha ma rung bar 'gyur mod/ ma rung bar mi 'gyur ro// ji ltar
128b8('dul ba): mi 'gyurakhyod kyis kho bo cag gi khang bzangs gnyis brtsigs la zla ba drug cing dus mchod gyis shig dang kho bo cag gi 'khor bzhag la/ dus mchod kyi tshe yang
129a1('dul ba): 'du bar bya'o// rgyal pos de bzhin du byas pa dang / de gnyis kyis 'khor dag kyang bzhag la/ dus mchod kyang rang nyid nyams su myong bar byed do// ji tsam dus
129a2('dul ba): gzhan zhig na de dag gi 'khor bag med par gnas pa na klu gdugs pa dag gis glags rnyed nas de dag gis ser ba dbab par brtsams// rgyal po'i khab na bram ze ser ba'i sdug
129a3('dul ba): la mkhas pa gzhan zhig yod de/ des de bab cing bab pa dag bcad pa dang / de la yul ma ga d+ha na gnas pa'i skye'o tshogs kyis dbang thang byin no// lho phyogs na bram ze mes byin zhes
129a4('dul ba): bya ba ser ba'i sngags la mkhas pa zhig yod pa des/ byang phyogs na yul nus pa can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na rgyal po sde mchog ces bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/ de'i yul
129a5('dul ba): na klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes kyi gnas yod de de na sman mthu che ba pha rol gnon pa yod par thos nas/ de'i cheda'agro'o zhes de chas te rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas/ bram ze
129a6('dul ba): ser ba'i sngags 'chang ba de'i gnas su zhugs pa dang / ji tsam na ser ba chen po 'bab pa bram ze gnyug mar gnas pa des bcad par ma nus nas/ de phyir byung nang du zhugs par byed pa dang / bram ze
129a7('dul ba): mes sbyin gyis dris pa/ mkhan po tsa'i slad du mkhan po 'di phyir byung nang du zhugs par mdzad des smras pa/ bu ser ba chen po bab pa bcad par ma nus pas mod/ bdag gis dgum mo// 
129a8('dul ba): bu legs so// de chu nyung zhig la bzlas te gtor bas tshal ba brgyar gyes so// rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas rngan pa thogs te/ bram ze de'i/ 
129b1('dul ba): khyim du dong nas smras pa mkhan pa rgyal po'i khab kyi skye bo'i tshags mngon par dga' bar gyis dran pa longs shig/ ci'i phyir/ khyod kyis ser ba chen po khums pa'i spang ngu'o// des smras pa/ khoza
129b2('dul ba): ni ma bcad de/ 'on kyang bram ze 'dis bcad do// de dag bram ze de'i drung du dong nas bram ze'i khye'u 'di nyid du 'dug shig dang dbang thang sbyin no// de bzhin du gnas par bya'o zhes nga gnas so// 
129b3('dul ba): des ser ba de dus tha gi tsam zhig gi bar du sngags kyis bgags te mi 'bab par gyur to// rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa shes ldan dag bdag cag nyid
129b4('dul ba): kyi bsod nams kyis sa rab mi 'bab na/ ci'i phyir de la dang dang thang sbyin zhes de rnams kyis bcad do// bram ze dnges sngags brtul nas yul nus pa can du song ba dang
129b5('dul ba): phyir yang ser ba 'bab par gyur to// de rnams bram ze de'i dru/ nga du song ste smras pa mkhan po bram ze'i khye'u de gar mchis/ des smras pa/ khyed cag gis
129b6('dul ba): del bkur bsti ma byas pas de song ngo // mkhan po gal te mchis na bdag cag la sbron cig/ de bzhin du bya'o// de yang rim gyis rgyal po sde mchog gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ rgyal po
129b7('dul ba): sde mchog la rgyal ba dang / tshe spel ba dag byas nas smras pa/ lha khyod kyi yul na klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes zhes bgyi ba mchis pa de'i gnas na mod la mthu skyed pa zhes bya ba'i
129b8('dul ba): sman mchis kyis lha de ston cig dang lha'i skal pa yang dbul bar bgyi'o// rgyal pos smras pa kye bram ze klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes ni gtum po yon pas des khyod rAg
130a1('dul ba): par mi byas grang lha re shig bdag la sngags kyi mthu dang sman gyi mthu mchis te/ gal te klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes dang 'dra ba'i klu rnams kyis 'dzam bu
130a2('dul ba): gling 'di lta ste/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ 'dam bu'i tshal bzhin gang bar gyur kyang / bdag gi ba spu gcig kyang bskyod par rngo mo thog na/ klu'i rgyal po rangab mdzes kyis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ 
130a3('dul ba): 'on kyang lha'i mi dgum pa la thug pa 'ga' mchis sam/ bram ze yod do// lha de skye shig dang / des de'i gnas ston par 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal pos ma de la bos te bsgo ba/ kye nang / 
130a4('dul ba): rje bram ze 'di la klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes kyi gnas ston cig/ lha ba ka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi bya des rgyal po'i ltar mnyan nas bra ma zi de khrid de chas so// ji tsam na ma ring ba zhig tu bsdad nas
130a5('dul ba): de la smras pa/ bram ze tshal sngo zhing sngo ba dag sbrengs pa/ pha bi mthong ngam/ mthong ngo // de ni klurgyal po rab mdzes kyi gnas yin no// de song ste nges der mod la
130a6('dul ba): mthu bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i sman las khur du drags nas des de thogs te/ yul nus pa can du song nas rgyal po sde mchog gi skal ba byin te/ rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas/ bram ze de nyid kyi khyim du
130a7('dul ba): zhugs so// de nas des rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams la sbran pa dang / de dag mchod yon thogs te lhags nas/ bram ze'i khye'u 'di nyid du 'dug shig dbang
130a8('dul ba): thang sbyin no// des smras pa/ khyed cag gis bkur sti ma byas pas kho bo mi 'dug go// de rnams kyis de gzhag par gal gyis 'chu bar brtsams te/ gsol ba btab pa dang / khas
130b1('dul ba): blangs nas de dag gis 'tshetsho ba'i rigs bcad do// 'jig rten ni phun sum tshogs pa 'dod kyi rgud pa dang mi mthubs des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse
130b2('dul ba): bar byed dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do// de rtse bar byed dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa na/ khye'u zhig btsas te/ des de'i ming ri bo can zhes
130b3('dul ba): bya bar btags so// de yang rtse bar byed dga' byed dga' dgur spyod par byed pa na bu mo zhig btsas te/ de'i ming ni ser po zhes bya bar btags so// bram ze mo ni 'khor bral zhes bya'o// 
130b4('dul ba): mna' ma ni klog ces bya'o// des bsams pa/ yang dang yang du ser ba gcod cing ci las med las byed zer/ yun rang rab tu sngags kyis bgag par bya'o zhes des yun ra / 
130b5('dul ba): bor sngags kyis bgag pa byas te bzhag pas ser ba mi 'bab par gyur to// rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag kho
130b6('dul ba): na'i bsod nams kyi mthus ser ba me 'bab na/ ci'i phyir dbang thang sbyin zhes de rnams kyis bcad do// bram ze de phrag dog gis zil gyis non pas bu yang sngags kyi tshig rnam
130b7('dul ba): 'dzin du ma bcug go// bde ba la chags pas kha don yang ma byas la/ sman yang skam du ma bcug go// des sngags kyi tshig rnams ni bsams na brjed/ sman ni ma bskams
130b8('dul ba): pas rul par gyur to// de rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams la snying na ches nas de rnams la klan ka btsal ba'i phyir mu stegs kyi gnas dang / dka' thub
131a1('dul ba): kyi tshal de dang de dag tu song nas dris pa/ shes ldan dag gis gang bsams pa dang / gang don du gnyer ba de la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba'i thabs lta
131a2('dul ba): yod/ de na kha cig gis smras pa/ mer zhugs shig/ kha cig gis smras pa dug zo shig/ kha cig gis smras pa/ g.yangs nas bdag nyid mchongs shig/ kha cig gis smras pa/ 
131a3('dul ba): bdag rang gi ske la thag pas thogs te/ shing gi yal ga las 'phyang du chug shig ces thams cad kyis 'chi ba'i thabs bstan gyi nges par 'byung ba'i thabs ni ma yin pas/ de ring gyis 'ad ma'i tshal
131a4('dul ba): du song ngo // des dge slong zhig mthong nas dris pa/ 'phag/ sa pa gang gis gang bsam pa dang / gang don du gnyer ba de la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba'i thabs lta 'ga'
131a5('dul ba): mchis sam/ de smras pa bcom ldan 'das las rab tu byung shig/ der ci zhig bgyi/ der ji srid 'tsho 'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa yang sprad par bya/ bsam gtan
131a6('dul ba): dang gnod pa dang ldan par yang gnas par bya ste/ gal te re shig mthong ba'i chos nyid la kun shes pa thob pa na/ des na de nyid khyod kyi sdug bsngal gyi mthar phyin pa yin no// 'on te sbyor
131a7('dul ba): ba'i lhag ma dang bcas bzhin dus byed na/ gang bsams pa dang / gang don du gnyer ba de la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa de ni rngo ma thog na/ gzhan yang cung
131a8('dul ba): zad ji mchis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drongs la gdugs tshod gsol to// de yang rngo ma thog na gzhan bstan du gsol/ bum pa bzang po lta bu'i nyan thos
131b1('dul ba): chen po bzhi spyan drongs la gdugs tshod gsol te/ smon lam thob shig dang / gang bsams pa dang gang don du gnyer ba de thams cad 'grub bo// 'phags pa de ni rdo thog gis bgyi'o zhes
131b2('dul ba): bum pa bzang po lta bu'i nyan thos chen po bzhi spyan drangs te gdugs chod gsol nas smon lam btab pa dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rab mdzes klu'i gnas nas bsad la bdag der skye zhing de nas rgyal por
131b3('dul ba): khab kyi mi rnams gnod pa byed par gyur cig ces btab po// de la chung mas dris pa/ rje'i sras smon lam ji zhig btab/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rab mdzes klu'i gnas nas bsad la bdag
131b4('dul ba): der skye zhing de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi mi rnams la gnod pa byed par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo// legs te bad dag kyang khyod kyi chung mar gyur cig/ bus smras pa bdag kyang khyod kyi
131b5('dul ba): bur gyur cig/ de bzhin du bu mos smras pa/ bdag kyang khyod kyi bu mor gyur cig/ de bzhin du mna' mas/ smras pa/ bdag kyang mna' mar gyur cig ces byas nas/ de
131b6('dul ba): rnams khyim rnying pa zhig tu zhugs te nyal ba dang / sprin kha dog lnga pa las char babs te/ rtsig pa 'gyel pas non te kha tag gi/ klu rab mdzes shi 'phos nas 'khor drug khri dang skyes
131b7('dul ba): nas de yang rab mdzes zhes bya bar grags so// chung ma 'khor bral zhes bya'o// bu ni ri bo can zhes bya'o// bu mo ni ser ba zhes bya'o// mna' ma ni klog ces bya'o// chos nyid kyis
131b8('dul ba): klu'amar klu'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon par gsum dran par 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos pa dang / gang du skyes pa dang / las gang gis yin pa'o// des bltas na mi las shing bos so// 
132a1('dul ba): gang du skyes she na klu rnams su'o// las gang gis she na smon lam gyi dbang gis so// ci'i phyir snyam na rgyal po'i khab kyi mi rnams la gnod pa bya ba'i phyir ro// 
132a2('dul ba): des bsams pa/ ci lo tog ji lta ba bzhin du skyes pa la bya na mi rnams kyi sdug bsngal skye bar 'gyur ram 'on te ma skyes pa rnams la 'gyur snyam na/ des ji ltar skyes pa la byas pa ltar ma
132a3('dul ba): skyes pa la ni de ltar ma yin par mthong nas/ des 'khor rnams la bsgo bshes ldan tshur shog/ yul ma ga d+har deng la char pas lo tog thams cad skran cig/ de rnams kyis lo tog thams cad
132a4('dul ba): bskrun pa dang / de nas drug stong gi 'khor dang / gshol mang tsam gyi char gyi rgyun gyis ji ltar yul ma ga d+har srog ma ya nga khyer ba de lta bu'i char gyi rgyun dbab par brtsams so// de nas
132a5('dul ba): de dag phan tshun du smras pa srog ma yang klu 'dis phrogs so zhes de 'i ming sog ma med ces bya bar thog so// sdom la rgya la po'i khab dang lan da// 'od ma'i da byug pa dmar bu'i gros
132a6('dul ba): chu bo gang ga sprin brtsigs dang // sgra chen yangs pa tha ma yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so// gang gi tshe gzhon nu ma skyes
132a7('dul ba): dag lhas sbyin gyis spang nas/ pha chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa bas de rang nyid kyi cod nas bcings nas/ rgyal por zhugs pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la bkur sti ma yin pa mang po bya bar brtsams
132a8('dul ba): dgongs pa man chad bya ba'i phyir glang po che nor skyong dang khyim gtum po za ba dag spad pa dang / de'i ma lus 'phags mas smras pa/ bu bcom ldan 'das la bkur bsti ma yin pam
132b1('dul ba): byed cig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bkur bsti ma yin pas bsnyengs pa yin gyis rgyal po'i khab nas bzhud de/ gnod par gyur ta re/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus yul ang / 
132b2('dul ba): ga dang mang ga d+ha rnams 'byor cing nyams dga' ba yin no// snying rnyog pa can des smras pa/ ci gang na bcom ldan 'das med pa'i yul de dag zhig pa dang / stongs par gyur tam/ de mas
132b3('dul ba): thams cad kyi thams cad du zlog kyang ma btub nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ gzhon nu ma skyes dag 'di bsod nams ma yin pa yang du stsogs kyis ngas 'di gzhi med pa'i dad pa la
132b4('dul ba): bzhags du re shig dus la ma bab pas mnyan yod du gshegs so// snyam nas// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te
132b5('dul ba): rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na mnyan yod du byon nas mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas/ sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mtha'i rgyal
132b6('dul ba): phran dag gis bcom ldan 'das la ma skyes dgras bkur sti ma yin pa byas pas de bkur bsti ma yin pas bsnyengs nas rgyal po'i khab nas gshegs te mnyan yod du byon to// zhes thos nas/ de dag
132b7('dul ba): 'di snyam du sems te/ re shig rgyal po sdig can nges pa chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa bsad na/ des kyang mchog nas bcom ldan 'das lha dang lha ma yin dang ma rnams kyis mchod
132b8('dul ba): bde la yang bkur bsti ma yin pa byas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bkur bstim yin pas bsnyengs pa yin pas de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab nas gshegs te mnyan/ 
133a1('dul ba): yod du byon par gyur pas de yong ye rgyal srid las dbyung bar bya'o snyam nas de dag gis phan tshun po nyas 'dug nas blo gros gcig tu byas te/ dpung gi tshogs
133a2('dul ba): yan lag bzhi pa go bskon pa glang po che'i tshogs dang rta pa'i tshogs dang / shing rta pa'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs dang / rgyal po'i khab tu dong ste lo bcom nas phru mar bskor
133a3('dul ba): de 'khod do/ klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kyis kyang ser ba'i rgyun phab pas lo tog lhag ma rnams ma rung bar byaso// dka' thub kyi chu lnga brgya dang / chu mig dang / mtsho dang / mtshe'u
133a4('dul ba): rnams skams la thugs pas mu ge byung bar gyur to// chu lhag ma gzhan dag kyang mtha'i rgyan phran dag gis dug gis ma rung bar byas so// de nas ma skyes dgra sdug bsngal mi bzad pa
133a5('dul ba): rtsa ba 'am nga bar gyur pa la mi ma yin pa dag gis glags rnyed de rma la/ thal bas btab pa ltar mi ngas byung ste/ khyogs// dang khyogs 'drung bar gyur te/ de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra
133a6('dul ba): gnod pa brgya phrag du ma snying dkrugs pas lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de soms khongs su chud cing 'dug go// de nas lus 'phags mes smras pa/ bu tse'i phyir sems khongs su chud yum gnod
133a7('dul ba): pa brgya phrag du ma dag byung bar gyur to// bu kho mos sngar khyod la bcom ldan 'das la bkur bsti ma yin pa ma byed cig// 'dul ba bzhi/ 
133a8('dul ba): bam po nyi shu drug pa// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bkur bsti ma yin pas bsnyengs pa yin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab nas bzhud de/ gnod par gyur ta re zhes
133b1('dul ba): ma smras sam/ de ni 'di yin no// yum de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ bu bcom ldan 'das la bzod par gsol cig/ yum bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchis pa'i rngo ma thog lags
133b2('dul ba): so/ bu khyod kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni can don dang ste'ur mnyam pa khong khro ba dang / rjes su chags pa spangs pa yin no zhes ma thos sam/ gal te 'ga' zhig gis
133b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag dpung pa gcig la ste'u yis 'jog par byed la/ cig shos la can dan sa mchog gis nyug par byed na de la bcom ldan 'das rjes su chags pa yang mi mnga' khong khro ba yang
133b4('dul ba): ma mnga'o/ de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu rgyal po ma skyes dgras mi zhig la smra ba kye nang rje chur shog/ khyod bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song la son
133b5('dul ba): nas/ kho bo'i chog gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho 'am
133b6('dul ba): gnod pa mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par bzhugs sam zhes snyun gsol la 'di skad ces kyang gsol cig/ btsun pa lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma
133b7('dul ba): skyes dgra'i mchid nas/ btsun pa bu ngan pa ni mchis kyi pha ngan pa ni ma mchis pas/ bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs par
133b8('dul ba): gsol gal te bcom ldan 'das ma gshegs na ring po mi thogs pa kho nar rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer stongs te/ mang lus par 'gyur ro zhes gsol cig/ lha bka'
134a1('dul ba): bzhin tshal zhes mi des ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i ltar mnyan nas chas te/ rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste
134a2('dul ba): phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas ma nges bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
134a3('dul ba): ces gsol to// btsun pa lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga nyung
134a4('dul ba): ngam zhes bya ba nas bde ba la reg par bzhugs sam/ zhes snyun gsol logs so// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// kye mi khyod dang / lus 'phags
134a5('dul ba): ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra bde bar gyur cig/ btsun pa lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma go d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dga'i mchid nas/ btsun pa bu ngan pa ni mchi/ 
134a6('dul ba): kyi pha ngan pa ni ma mchis pas/ bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse bas nye bar bzung ste/ rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su gsol/ gal te bcom ldan 'das ma gshegs na/ 
134a7('dul ba): zhes bya ba nas ming lus par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas mo de la gnang ngo // de nas mi de bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang
134a8('dul ba): bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das ji srid bzhed kyi bar du mnyan yod du bzhugs nas/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig
134b1('dul ba): tu rgyal po'o khab grang na bder rgyu zhing gshegs te/ rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na yul ma ga d+har byon to// bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus rlung gtong ba'i lha'i bu rnam gron dug gas ma/ 
134b2('dul ba): rung bar byas pa'i chu de dag bskams so// char pa 'bebs pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis ni yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus bkang ngo // lha rnams na char pa 'bebs pa la zhugs so// sangs
134b3('dul ba): rgyas la mngon par dad pa'i lha rnams kyis ni rgyal po'i khab nas mi ma yin pa rnams bskrad nas mi ngas zhi bar gyur to// mtha'i rgyal phran dag gis ni bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa thong nas grong
134b4('dul ba): khyer bskor ba btang ste dong ngo // tshong pa rnams kyis ni zong dag bkram mo// bzo phal pa gzhan dag gis ni rang rang byed par brtsams so// yul so son
134b5('dul ba): gnas pa'i tshong pa rnams dang / ded dpon rnams ni zong dang / 'jug par brtsams so// lo na legs par gyur to// lam po che dang / srang dang sum mdo dang / bzhi mdo
134b6('dul ba): rnams su ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag nyid chen po sgrogs par gyur to// mu stegs pa ni bag 'khums par gyur to// skye bo'i tshogs rnams ni rab tu dga' bar gyur to// lus 'phags
134b7('dul ba): ma'i bu yang ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgas / bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+har gshegs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang snying dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang rab tu dga' ba dang / dga'
134b8('dul ba): ba rgya chen po dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ blon po rnams la smras pa shes ldan dag deng la bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir dpag tshad phye dang gsum gyi lam bltar ba dang // grong khyer dag
135a1('dul ba): bzang por byos shig/ rgyal po khab kyi grong khyer thams cad kyang rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo sal to// tsan dan gyi chus chag chag thob la dang
135a2('dul ba): gyi chun 'phyang mang po spongs shig/ dri zhim pog phor dag shoms la/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dag tshugs shig/ bar bar me tog gi gzhal med mdzes pa dag byos shig/ lha dka' bzhin
135a3('dul ba): 'tshal zhes blon po rnams kyis lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dga'i ltar mnyan nas thams cad rgyas par byed du bcug go// de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal
135a4('dul ba): po ma skyes dgra/ rgyal po chen po'i 'byor pa dang / nga rgyal po chen po'i mthus bdag nyid dpung ga/ de tshogs yan lag bzhi dang gsung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'dra/ 
135a5('dul ba): dul ba 'khor dul/ zhi ba 'khor zhi ba/ grol ba 'khor grol ba/ dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa/ rnam par dul ba 'khor rnam par dul ba/ dgra bcom pa 'khor
135a6('dul ba): dgra bcom pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba/ mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa/ khyu mchog pa lang gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ glang po che glang po che'i phru gum
135a7('dul ba): tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ seng ge mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nam mkha'i lding mdab chags kyi tshogs kyis
135a8('dul ba): bskor ba lta bu/ bram ze slob ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ sman pa mkhas pa na dang 'a tshigs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ dpa' bo dmag gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ lam mkhan 'dron pon
135b1('dul ba): tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ded dpon tshong pa'i tshogs kyis bskor blta bu tshong dpon rang gi skye bos bskor ba lta bu/ rgyal phran blon pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'khor lo bsgyur ba bu
135b2('dul ba): stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu nyi ma 'od zer stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ yul 'khor skyong dri za'i tshegs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ lus 'phags pa
135b3('dul ba): grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu mig mi bzang klu'i tshigs kyis bskor ba lta bu nor sbyin gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu thag bzang res lha ma yin gyi tshogs
135b4('dul ba): kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i cho gas kyis bskor ba lta bu/ tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rgya mtsho ma g.yo ba lta bu sprin chu dang bcas
135b5('dul ba): pa lta bu glang po che dam pa dang bral ba ltar dbang po rnam sa shin tu dul bsam g.yengs pa'i spyod pa can/ sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan
135b6('dul ba): pa dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ sku 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa nyi ma stong gi 'od zer bas lhag pa/ rin po che'i ro bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes pa/ stobs
135b7('dul ba): bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa gsum dang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun rab tu mang po dang lus 'phags ma'i bu yul
135b8('dul ba): ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang / lha brgya stong phrag du mas zham ring byas te rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du gshegs so// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs te/ mngon par 'du
136a1('dul ba): byed pa dang bcas pas/ grong khyer gyi sgo'i thim pa la zhabs g.yas pas mnan pa de'i tshe rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur tes chen po'ang g.yos/ rab tu g.yos
136a2('dul ba): kun tu rab tu g.yos/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg cing shar phyogs mthon nub phyogs dpa'/ nub phyogs mthon shar phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dpal
136a3('dul ba): byang phyogs mthon lho phyogs dma'/ mtha' mtho na dbus dma'/ dbus mthon mtha' dma' bar gyur to// 'jig rten 'di 'jig rten gyi bar dang bcas pa thams cad kyang snang ba rgya chen pos gsal
136a4('dul ba): bar gyur to// lhas kyang bar snang la rnga brdungs so// nam mkha' la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis ni bcom ldan 'a/ dus kyi steng nas lha'i me tog uta pa la dang / pad+ma dang
136a5('dul ba): ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / a ka ru'i phye ma dang / rgya spos kyi phye ma dang / gu gum gyi phye ma dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma dang / lha'i me tog man d+ha ra ba dang / 
136a6('dul ba): gos dag 'thor bar byed de/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa na/ de lta bu'i yam chen dag byung bar gyur to// gzhan yang dog pa dag ni yangs par gyur to// dma' ba dag ni mtho bar gyur to// 
136a7('dul ba): mtho ba dag ni phya le bar gyur to// glang po che dag ni skad 'byin par gyur to// rta dag kyang skad 'byin par gyur to// khyu mchog dag kyang skad 'byin par gyur to// khyim gyi nang na bzhag pa'i snod
136a8('dul ba): sna tshogs dag ni ma brdungs par rang sgra 'byin par gyur te/ long ba rnams kyis ni mig thob par gyur to// 'on pa rnams ni rna bas sgra thos par gyur to// lkugs pa rnams ni smra nus par gyur to// 
136b1('dul ba): dbang po lhag ma mthang ba rnams ni dbang pos sar thob par gyur to// chang gis myos pa rnams ni myos pa dang dral bar gyur to// dug mthus pa dag ni bar gyur to// ban dun 'khon byung
136b2('dul ba): rnams ni mdza' bar gyur to// snum ma dag ni bde bar btsas par gyur to// btson du bcings pa dag ni thar par gyur to// nor med pa dag ni nir rnyed par gyur to// de lta du
136b3('dul ba): 'byor ba de mthong nas/ dge bsnyen zhig gis tshig su bcad de smras pa/ yul gang zhig tu 'jig rten gtso bor gshegs pa dang // logs mangs dang na phyi dgra'i 'jigs pa med// lha rnams char
136b4('dul ba): 'bebs skye bo bsod nams rab tu byed// der ni ya ma tshan brgya phrag gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs te/ skye bo'i chag
136b5('dul ba): dbugs phyung nas rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste/ 'od ma'i tshal du gshegs so// de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra bcom ldan
136b6('dul ba): 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang bcom ldan 'das
136b7('dul ba): kyis lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dag la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzeng stong
136b8('dul ba): bar mdzad ces bya ba nas/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po
137a1('dul ba): ma skyes dgra bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par brjod de/ rjes su yi rang nas stan las langs te/ thugs phrag pa gcig tugs
137a2('dul ba): nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la
137a3('dul ba): bdag gis dgung zla gsum du na bza' chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun spyad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad 'bul zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan/ 
137a4('dul ba): 'das kyis lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ 
137a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das cang ma gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ stan las langs te song ngo // bcom ldan 'das
137a6('dul ba): dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ zla ba gsum du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang bskrun
137a7('dul ba): dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas so// de nas sangs rgyas la mngon par dga' ba'i lha rnams kyis/ mings de bskrad nas rgyal po'i khab nas byung
137a8('dul ba): nas sgra sgrogs zhes bya ba'i nang du byung ste/ yangs pa can du 'dug nas/ yangs pa can gyi skye bo'i tshogs la ma ngas byung gyur te/ khyogs dang khyogs 'drud par gyur to// 
137b1('dul ba): yangs pa can bram ze mdunan 'don mda' bo chen zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa de'i rmi lam na yangs pa can na gnas pa'i lha zhig gis smras pa/ gal te ma 'dul kha lo sbyor ba'i mchog/ 
137b2('dul ba): shAkya'i rigs dga' ba yobacom ldan 'das// yangs pa can du gshegs par 'gyur nano// gan pa rnam par 'jigs par 'gyur// des namanangs nas yangs pacan gyims
137b3('dul ba): rnams la smras pa/ gis ldan dag dag gi tshulal 'di 'dri ba zhig mthong ngo // de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan ga la gyur bsgrub par bya/ bcom ldan
137b4('dul ba): 'das kyi spyan sngar pho nya su zhig btang zhes phan tshun 'gro bar brtsams pa dang / mdun na 'din mda' bo che 'di nyid tham sra cad du nus pa yin la/ bdag cag la yang byams
137b5('dul ba): pa yin gyis btang ngo // de la de dag gis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song la phyin nas/ bdag cag tshigs gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
137b6('dul ba): la mgo bos phyag byos la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam zhes bya ba nas snyun gsol ba zhes bya ba 'bar gong ma bzhin du'o// 'di skad ces kyang gsol cig/ 
137b7('dul ba): btsun pa yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyi mchid nas/ bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can du gshegs su gsol/ gal te bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can ma gshegs na/ ring po mi thogs
137b8('dul ba): pa kho nar yangs pa can stongs shing ming lus par 'gyur ro zhes gsol cig/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra ni khyed la yun ring
138a1('dul ba): duganod pa byed pa'i byor rgol pa dgra por gyur pa yin pas bdag la gnod pa byed par mi 'gyur grang / de dag gis tshigasu bcad de smras pa/ sul
138a2('dul ba): 'khor gzhan dang 'gyid par yang // po nya mi gsod ces grag na// khyod ni rgyal ba'i pho nya yin// kun gyis mi gsod smras ci dgos// de nas mdun na 'don mda' bo che dge mtshan
138a3('dul ba): dang bkra shis dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dag byas te/ rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas/ de lam gyis dub pa bsal te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom
138a4('dul ba): ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur bad dang / yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ 
138a5('dul ba): phyogs gcig tu 'dug nasamadun na 'don mda' dro ches bcom ldan 'das la 'ad skad ces gsol to// kye go'u tam yangs pa can gyi tshogs bcom ldan 'das go'u
138a6('dul ba): ta ma'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal to// gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam 'tsho 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ stobs dang bde ba la reg
138a7('dul ba): par spyod dam/ zhes nyun gsol lags so// mnga' bo che khyod dang yangs pa can gyi tshogs bde bar gyur cig/ kye go'u tam yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyi mchod nas/ bcom ldan
138a8('dul ba): 'das yangs pa can du gshegasu gsol/ gal te bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can du ma gshegs na/ ring po mi thogs pa kho nar yangs pa can stongs shing ming tsam lus par 'gyuraro zhes
138b1('dul ba): mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa mda' po che 'dirang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma gang+gA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras zla ba gsum dum
138b2('dul ba): byad thams cad kyis bstab pas rgyal po la rtogs shig/ gal te rgyal pos gnang nang de bzhin du gshegs par bya'o// des yangs pa can du bcom ldan 'das ni 'di skad ces gsung ngo zhes
138b3('dul ba): spring ngo / de rnams kyis kyang spring pa de nyid kyi phyir khong lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra gang na ba der song la son nas bdag cig gi tshig gis lus 'phags mar
138b4('dul ba): bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam 'tshe'/ gnod pa ma mchis samastobs dang
138b5('dul ba): bde ba la reg par gnas sam/ zhes kyang dris la'// de skad ces lha bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can du gsheg/ sa par bcom ldan 'das la rjes su gnang bar mdzad du
138b6('dul ba): gsol/ lhas gal te bcom ldan 'das la rjes su glanang na ring po mi thogs pa kho nar yangs pa can stongs shing ming lus par 'gyur ro zhes smros shig/ de nas mdun na 'dzin
138b7('dul ba): mda' bo ches bsams pa/ ci re shig rgyal po la bsnyen par bya 'am/ 'on te blon po rnams la bya snyam du bsams pa dang / de 'di snyam du sems te 'ga' zhig bsnyen
138b8('dul ba): par mi bya ste/ 'on kyang bsnyen par byed pa la bsnyen par bya'o zhes 'byung bas/ mdor na blon po rnams la bsnyen par bya'o snyam nas/ des blon po rnams la bsnyen par bya bar brtsam
139a1('dul ba): so/ 'de nas blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ mdun na 'don dgos pa ci zhig la 'ongs/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag kho bo na bcom ldan 'das kyi
139a2('dul ba): phyir lha la gsol ba 'deb su mchis kyis/ khyed cag gis grags mdzod cig/ de rnams kyis smras pa de bzhin du byas kho ba cag gis jiH man bos pa de'i tshe khyod shog cig/ ri nas de ngag
139a3('dul ba): gis skabs shes nas bos pa dang / de nas mdun na 'don mda' bo tshe lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra gang na ba der song ste son nas lus 'phags ma'i bu
139a4('dul ba): yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra la rgyal ba dang da spel ba dag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ ngas gcig tu 'dug nas/ mdun na 'don mnga' bo ches lus
139a5('dul ba): 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'dri skad ces smras so// lha yangs pa can gyi tshe gas kyi mchid nas/ lha la gnod pa chung ngam/ reg
139a6('dul ba): par gnas sam zhes bya ba rgyas snyun gsol/ mda' bo che khyod dang yangs pa can gyi tshogs bde bar gyur cig/ lha yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyi mchid nas/ 'di skad ces
139a7('dul ba): lha bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can du gshegs par bcom ldan 'das la rjes su gnang ba mdzad du gsol lhas gal te bcom ldan 'das rjes su ma gnang na/ ring po mi thogs pa
139a8('dul ba): kho nar yangs pa can stongs shing ming lus par 'gyur ro zhes mche'o// rgyal pos smras pa mnga' bo che kho bos yun ring mo zhig nas/ kye ma yangs pa can gyi gnas stongs kyang tsam
139b1('dul ba): rung snyam du bsams te/ gal te yangs pa can gyi gnas stongs par gyur na/ khro za yid la bsams pa tshogs chung ngus rdzogs par ma gyur tam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / mnga' / 
139b2('dul ba): chosang ngo / blon po rnams kyis smras pa lha bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can gcig kyang yongs su btang ba lta mchis sam/ shes ldan dag med do// de lta na lngas
139b3('dul ba): ldan 'das la bkur bsti ma lags pa bgyis so// lhas bcom ldan 'das la rjes su gnang yang rung ma gnang yang rung ste/ bcom ldan 'das ni yangs pa can gyi sems can la thugs rtse ba
139b4('dul ba): phyir gshegs par 'gyur ba nyid do// rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag kho bos ma shes kyis/ gal teng lta na khugashig/ de dag gis mnga' bo che bkug nas rgyal pos
139b5('dul ba): smras pa mnga' bo che kho bos dam bca' ste/ bcom ldan 'das rjes su gnang bar bya'o// gal/ te kho bos bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang / bsnyen
139b6('dul ba): bkur ci 'dra ba byas pa de kho na 'dra bar yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyis bya na/ de lta na kho bos rjes su gnang ngo // des yongs pa can pa rnams la rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsung ngo zhes
139b7('dul ba): spring ngo // de rnams kyis smras pa/ rgyal po ma gcig pur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang / bkur bsti byed na bdag cag tshogs su gyur pas ci ste mi bya zhes de dag gis bcom
139b8('dul ba): ldan 'das gshegs su gsol cig dang / bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das de bas kyang / ches khyad par 'phags pa'i mchod pa dang / bkur bsti bgyi'o zhes spring po
140a1('dul ba): sa ma sa rdul grol ga pa sa so// shes su dgas pa ngastsa klu rgyal pa rkye dang mas na sa / 
140a2('dul ba): bde sa khyenas/ bcom ldan padas kyi gangs gnyis la mag pas byas byas te// byags gag 'gyu/ gas gusas sa
140a3('dul ba): bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / thangs gcig la bdag ji
140a4('dul ba): srida'i tshe bar du da papa' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims chadang btsun dbyang kyi rkyen sman dud yo byad rnams kyis bzhin kur btsud par sgra lags tshang / 
140a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams lathugs brtse bas gnang rami 'gyur lags na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi rnaM mchod kyi gdugs tshang gsal bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ 
140a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis lus 'angags ma'o bu yul mag d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgral cang ma gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan
140a7('dul ba): 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te song ngo // de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu su la ma ga d+ha
140a8('dul ba): rgyal po ma skyes dgras de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol ban nasaphyag bcabs te ltung brjed gru bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i
140b1('dul ba): bar gong ma bzhin du'o// gser gyi byam bum blangs te bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs pa la zhugs pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis klu gdugus pa dang / gnod sbyin gdu/ 
140b2('dul ba): pa de dang de rnams ni btul lags na btsun pa klu'i rgyal po sog ma med 'di yun ring mo zhig nas/ bdag cag la sha khon ma mchis par ni sha khon bgyid/ mgran zla ma mchis
140b3('dul ba): par ni mgran zlar gyur/ gnod pa ma mchis par ni gnod pa bgyid par gyur te/ lo tog gang dag skyes shing skyes pa rnams chud gzon par bgyid lags na bcom ldan
140b4('dul ba): 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste klu'i rgyal po so gas ma med legs par gdul bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma
140b5('dul ba): skyes dgral cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'a/ das lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skye/ sa dgra la yon bsngo ba mdzad nas gshegs te gtsug
140b6('dul ba): lag khang du byon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'
140b7('dul ba): bo byang phyogs su klu'i rgyal po sog ma med 'dul du 'dong ngo // byang phyogs na ni phan yon lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ me tog phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'bras bu phun sum
140b8('dul ba): tshogs pa dang / chu phun sum tshogs pa dang / bsod snyoms mod pa dang / skye bo'i tshogs drang po yod do zhes gsungs nas/ bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog go
141a1('dul ba): byang bcug lag lang du zhugs so// de nas lus lags mar bu yul ma gad+ha rgyal pos skyes dgras rgyal po'i kha sa nu gang ga ba
141a2('dul ba): lam dang grong khyer dag mthang du stong du bcug ste/ lam rje ba dang gasregs ma dang gyo mi thams cad bas la nas/ tsan dan gyi nus chag chag btang/ br-in mtshan
141a3('dul ba): tshogs kyi pog por dag pa gams/ dang kyi rkun 'phyang mang po sbyangs/ bar bar du me tog gi gzhal med khang dag byas so// yangs pa can gyil tsa bya rnams kyis/ chub ga ga
141a4('dul ba): yam pa can ma bang du dengs lhag par khyad par du 'phags pa lam dang grong khyer dag sbyor du jug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs gnang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs
141a5('dul ba): tshedang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal ba/ kun dag/ 'bon lan dgang na ba der 'dong ngo // btsun pa bka' / zhon 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi
141a6('dul ba): ltar mnyan nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dang / yul ma ga d+ha'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ na lon dang byon nas/ na lan dan a pra'i tshal dgag dbye can zhes bya ba na bzhugs so// de \u0f7f
141a7('dul ba): nan la nang na rgyu 'dam du'i tshong ba zhes bya ba rgas pa 'khogs pa gtugs pa bcas nas lo brgya nyi shu lon bzhig gnas pa la nalan da'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams bkur
141a8('dul ba): byed/ bla mar byed mor byed/ mchod par byed de dgra bcom par bkur ro// / de nas kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong ba'i sngon gyi grogs po dang / blon po dang / gnyen dang sngag sa
141b1('dul ba): gnyen mtshams su gyur pa'i lha gang yin pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te bdag gis kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong ba la 'di skad ces drang srong khyod chur shog bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par/ 
141b2('dul ba): spyad pa spyod cig ces sman/ gang yang bdag gis tshigs ma snyan pa de srid pas mal bdag de'i drung du song ste/ yid kyi dri ba 'dzin tu gzhug go snyam nas/ de nas lha kum tu rgyu
141b3('dul ba): 'dam bu'i tshong pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas kun tu 'dam bu'i tshong pa la 'di skad ces smras// drang srong tshur shog/ kho bo las yid kyi dri ba long la kun chub par gyis shig/ ji ltar
